name: Sarah Chen
content: SEObot transformed my content strategy! I went from publishing 2 articles a month to 12, and my organic traffic increased by 300% in just 3 months. The AI really understands my niche.

name: Mike Rodriguez
content: As a solo founder, I don't have time to write SEO content. SEObot does it for me, and the quality is amazing. It even adds internal links to my existing pages automatically!

name: Emma Watson
content: I was skeptical about AI content at first, but SEObot proved me wrong. The articles it generates are well-researched, engaging, and actually rank on Google. Game changer!

name: David Kim
content: Best ROI I've ever seen in a content tool. For the price of one freelance writer, I get unlimited articles that are perfectly optimized for my SaaS blog. Highly recommend!

name: Lisa Thompson
content: SEObot analyzed my site and found content gaps I didn't even know existed. The content plan it generated is spot-on, and execution is flawless. This is the future of content marketing!

name: James Anderson
content: Went from 500 monthly visitors to 15K in 6 months using SEObot. The AI understands search intent better than most human writers I've worked with. Worth every penny!
